name: Nalgene 500ml Everyday Narrow-Mouth Water Bottle
description: Super durable, BPA-free, narrow-mouth 500ml bottle, for staying hydrated wherever you go.Made of Tritan™ co-polyester.Ultra durable and ready for cold and warm beverages.Coloured body with convenient loop top to prevent lid loss.Note: Not recommended for use in cold weather or mountaineering due to narrow mouth and possibility of bottle freezing.
